title: Directs New York city housing authority to first offer vacant apartments to mobility impaired tenants living on a higher floor
summary: Directs New York city housing authority to first offer vacant apartments to mobility impaired tenants living on a higher floor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to granting tenants, with a physically disabling condition that affects their mobility, a preference in occupying a vacant dwelling unit on a lower floor in the same building in projects operated by the New York city housing authority
